Body: The camera on my Android tablet doesn't let me take any pictures. It says Insert an SD card before using the camera.I didnt need an SD card before. I put an SD card in and it still says the same thing!Is there a solution to my problem that would help? I already tried the solution proposed in Sophix tablet will not work without an SD card, but it didn't solve my problem.
Title: My Camera on my android tablet isn't letting me take any pictures. help?

history.Text: The camera on my android tablet doesnt let me take any pictures it says 'insert an sd card before using the camera'and i didnt need an sd card before i put an sd card in and it still says the same thing.. is there a solution to my problem that would help?
